articles.description: Earlier this month, the Google-owned video-sharing platform began testing AI-generated summaries for videos. These summaries provide users with quick overviews, helping them decide if a video aligns with their interests.

articles.title: Amazon employee loses job after 9 years of service, says being part of layoffs is not easy - India Today
articles.description: A former Amazon employee took to LinkedIn and said that being a part of layoffs is not easy. She was fired from the company after being a part of it for 9 years.
